          <title>
            <string language="sl">Stanja vode</string>
            <string language="en">Phases of water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phasen des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Phases de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fases da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fasi di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσεις ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fases del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vrstni red reševanja ni pomemben, učenec spoznava zakonitosti v naravi - stanja vode.</string>
            <string language="en">Different phases of water and how to get from one phase to another.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">led</string>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">voda</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Phasen des Wassers und wie man 
von einer Phase zu anderen erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différentes phases de l'eau et comment obtenir 
d'une phase à l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fases diferentes da água e como começar de uma 
fase a outra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fasi differenti di acqua e come ottenere da una 
fase ad un altro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικές φάσεις ύδατος και πώς να φτάσει από μια
φάση σε άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversas fases del agua y cómo conseguir a 
partir de una fase a otra.</string>
          </description>
